gen:link.msg:message: `AccruedIncome` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_AccruedIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_AccruedIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivablesFromMinistryOCW` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `hbo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_ReceivablesFromMinistryOCW')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU3_ReceivablesFromMinistryOCW return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivablesFromMinistryOCW` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `wo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU4_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU4_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU4_ReceivablesFromMinistryOCW')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU4_ReceivablesFromMinistryOCW return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
